dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1964
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An anniversary column reaffirming Peter Maurin as the founder and their trial and error approach to meet his ideals. Says they are a community of "wounded ones" and are not complacent about accomplishments. Appreciates a day of recollection. Describes their new farm at Tivoli and plans for retreats that will send forth others "to speak truth to power."
